column3: {([G'morning kid. . . Don't forget to make a decision about how you want to spend your day. It'll get away from you quickly.])}
{([Such a lovely morning here at Miriabram. Good luck in the festival!])}

{([G'morning kid. . . Have you seen Mercurio? He's supposed to train with me today, but I haven't seen him.])([Huh. . . Well, I'll keep an eye out.][Oh! I wonder what he's doing out there. Will you ask him to come by?])}
